body:
Comment 2: 
I would tend to agree that helpers shouldn't necessarily be there in container/list,
which strikes me as the 
minimal possible implementation.  However, for consistency (which I believe to be
all-important), the fact 
remains that PushFront() and PushBack() are present, so I think the decision should
either be made to add the Pop 
functions or to delete the Push functions as well.
